class.name: MaterialParser
class.brief_description: Parses MaSzyna material files and creates [MaszynaMaterial] resources.
class.description:
[MaterialParser] is responsible for reading and parsing MaSzyna material definition files (.mat format). It extracts material properties such as shader configuration, texture paths for diffuse and normal maps, and creates corresponding [MaszynaMaterial] resource objects. The parser handles the MaSzyna material file format and populates the appropriate texture paths based on the file's contents.
This class is typically used internally by [MaterialManager] but can also be used directly to parse material files.

method.name: parse
method.description: Parses a MaSzyna material file and returns a [MaszynaMaterial] resource. The [param material_manager] is used to resolve the full file path. If the material file cannot be found, returns a material with the [param material_path] as the albedo texture.
